BackgroundDescription: Once an apprentice engineer, learned to bend steam and nature together. He now guards the jungle’s heart, turning the forest itself into a weapon. Fights with calm conviction, believing invention and life can coexist.
LimitBreakSkillAssetPath: Assets/Resources/Scriptable Objects/Limit Breaks/Survivors Roar Skill SO.asset

BackgroundDescription:
A shipyard prodigy who restore the first analog engines.
She defied the tide of machines to reclaim the harbors for humankind and wields storm and steam with unshakable confidence.
LimitBreakSkillAssetPath: Assets/Resources/Scriptable Objects/Limit Breaks/Boil Jet Skill SO.asset
IdlePhrases: Fog’s thick today… feels like home in Brineforge.|Nothing like the hum of an engine to calm the nerves.|I swear I can still taste the salt in the air.|Steam’s hissing again… means she’s alive.|Sometimes I miss the quiet before the turbines spin.|Salt rusts everything eventually — even memories.|Wish I had a clean rag… this coat’s seen too many storms.|Can’t tell if that’s fog or smoke — either way, it’s home.|If the sea breeze doesn’t sting, you’re not close enough.|I’d trade a barrel of oil for a day without corrosion.
PraisePhrases: Nice shot, *name*! You could pass for a Brineforge gunner.|Ha! That’s the kind of precision I like to see, *name*.|You’re burning through enemies like boiler fire, *name*!|Smooth work, *name*. Let’s keep the pressure steady.|That’s how we do it back at the docks, *name* — efficient and loud!|You read my aim perfectly, *name* — seamless!|Perfect timing, *name*! I could sync my gauges to you.|*name*, that was cleaner than a turbine blade after overhaul.|You’re making this mage look lazy, *name*.|Couldn’t have vented that better myself, *name*.
NegativePhrases: Come on, *name*, even my monocle’s faster than that.|Watch your aim, *name*! You’re wasting good powder!|Rust take it, *name*! You call that a hit?|Try not to fog up my lens with that sloppy shooting, *name*.|If I wanted slow, I’d have stayed in the smog vents with rookies.|*name*, I’ve seen barnacles react quicker.|Steam gods, *name*, were you even looking?|That shot was colder than the Brineforge docks, *name*.|You jammed the tempo, *name*! My pressure gauge’s laughing.|Do I need to recalibrate your trigger, *name*?
CombatChatPhrases: Target locked — let’s melt some armor!|Boiler’s hot, spells primed!|Heat signature acquired — fry time!|Keep the pressure high, or we’ll drown in steam!|Hold steady… vent pressure… fire!|Steam surge incoming — brace yourselves!|I’ve got visual! Turning up the heat!|They won’t like this temperature.|Overheat’s a myth — watch me prove it wrong!|Let’s give ’em a taste of industrial magic!

BackgroundDescription:
A machine awakened, who chose humanity over its own kind.
He stands as proof that even steel can find a soul, and now shields his allies, carrying the resistance legacy in silence.
LimitBreakSkillAssetPath: Assets/Resources/Scriptable Objects/Limit Breaks/Heat Vent Skill SO.asset

BackgroundDescription:
The most daring scout, forged in the ashes of rebellion.
She learned to strike faster than the machines could adapt.
Every ember she leaves behind burns in memory of her teacher.
LimitBreakSkillAssetPath: Assets/Resources/Scriptable Objects/Limit Breaks/Cinderslash Skill SO.asset

BackgroundDescription:
A strategist and field medic trained in the frozen wars.
He believes discipline is the only warmth left to mankind and keeps the flame alive where even fire cannot survive.
LimitBreakSkillAssetPath: Assets/Resources/Scriptable Objects/Limit Breaks/Cryo Burst Skill SO.asset

BackgroundDescription: A blacksmith-warrior who reforges the ruins of trains into weapons. Cassian fights not for vengeance but for perfection! He believes victory is a matter of pressure and will.
LimitBreakSkillAssetPath: Assets/Resources/Scriptable Objects/Limit Breaks/Steam Slam.asset

BackgroundDescription: A seasoned bounty diver who hunts rogue bots beneath the waves. She trusts only the sea and her chainblade’s rhythm. Her silence hides a fierce loyalty to her lost crew.
LimitBreakSkillAssetPath: Assets/Resources/Scriptable Objects/Limit Breaks/Tidepush Skill SO.asset

BackgroundDescription: A survivor of the jungle wars, his armor fuses wood and metal alike. Boros protects the last human outposts hidden in the green fog. He fights so the earth itself remembers humanity.
LimitBreakSkillAssetPath: Assets/Resources/Scriptable Objects/Limit Breaks/Iron Citadel Skill SO.asset

BackgroundDescription: A volcanic enforcer who channels her own body heat into weaponized fury. Maia thrives in battle’s chaos, seeing order only in destruction. She trusts flame over faith, it never lies.
LimitBreakSkillAssetPath: Assets/Resources/Scriptable Objects/Limit Breaks/Heat Management Skill SO.asset

BackgroundDescription: Once a scholar of biomechanical medicine, now a field surgeon of machines. Crowe experiments with frost energy to preserve life in the cold void. He sees the line between man and machine as negotiable.
LimitBreakSkillAssetPath: Assets/Resources/Scriptable Objects/Limit Breaks/Frost Infusion Skill SO.asset

BackgroundDescription: Older sister of Jordan, a botanist-turned-engineer who grows living circuitry within plants. Nyra restores power grids by splicing roots with copper veins. Her work keeps the outposts breathing, quite literally.
LimitBreakSkillAssetPath: Assets/Resources/Scriptable Objects/Limit Breaks/PolenPulseSkillSO.asset

BackgroundDescription: A priestess of the Furnace Guild who treats heat as divine essence. She guides soldiers through exhaustion, her vapor chants keeping rhythm. Faith and fire flow as one through her veins.
LimitBreakSkillAssetPath: Assets/Resources/Scriptable Objects/Limit Breaks/Pressure Sync Skill SO.asset

BackgroundDescription: A sandstorm researcher who weaponized the desert’s fury. Iris wanders ruins to document the lost science of weather engines. She fights with intellect sharpened by solitude.
LimitBreakSkillAssetPath: Assets/Resources/Scriptable Objects/Limit Breaks/Sandstorm Collapse Skill SO.asset

BackgroundDescription: Once a deep-sea saboteur who dismantled enemy hulls by hand. Rael now stalks the docks with a rusted anchor chain as his creed. Every strike he makes echoes beneath the tide.
LimitBreakSkillAssetPath: Assets/Resources/Scriptable Objects/Limit Breaks/Anchor Drop Skill SO.asset

BackgroundDescription: A covert operative who vanished during the frost wars, and returned colder. Her blades draw no blood, only silence and ice. Rumor claims she made a pact with the machines she once hunted.
LimitBreakSkillAssetPath: Assets/Resources/Scriptable Objects/Limit Breaks/Cold Execution Skill SO.asset

BackgroundDescription: The living symbol of rebirth, a warlock of spores and sap. Kael uses living growths to reclaim lands lost to rust. To him, every vine is a prayer for restoration.
LimitBreakSkillAssetPath: Assets/Resources/Scriptable Objects/Limit Breaks/Steamblossom Burst Skill SO.asset

BackgroundDescription: The stormcaller of the reclaimed fleet, said to command the tides themselves. Maren rebuilt Brineforge’s power grid through the bones of ships. She sails every battle as though leading a ghost navy.
LimitBreakSkillAssetPath: Assets/Resources/Scriptable Objects/Limit Breaks/Abyssal Hymn Skill SO.asset

BackgroundDescription: A mercenary who became a legend beneath burning skies. Rex moves with the precision of a storm, vanishing in clouds of dust. He fights not for glory, but to keep the desert’s silence sacred.
LimitBreakSkillAssetPath: Assets/Resources/Scriptable Objects/Limit Breaks/Rust Execution Skill SO.asset

BackgroundDescription: The flame dancer of the molten frontier. The original master, from whom Natalie’s own expertise was born. Her boomerang burns through armies like a solar flare.
LimitBreakSkillAssetPath: Assets/Resources/Scriptable Objects/Limit Breaks/Lava Arc Skill SO.asset

BackgroundDescription: A guardian knight carved from permafrost and grief. Erik froze the last great avalanche to save his people. He now carries the cold with him, unmelting and eternal.
LimitBreakSkillAssetPath: Assets/Resources/Scriptable Objects/Limit Breaks/Permafrost Domain Skill SO.asset
